Description: The journal article is the only record of the research, with the reader invited to contact the author for more details.
The journal article is accompanied by files of raw data tables in PDF files and supplementary text describing the methods in more detail.

The journal article includes DOIs to an open access repository that contains plain text files (e.g., CSV format) of raw data, version-controlled script files of R or Python code to reproduce the numbers and figures in the article, and a dockerfile that documents the computational environment of the published analysis.
